pageContent.title: Use Trends Effectively
pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Use Trends Effectively</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">“It’s important to use trends in a conversation with Dr. Gomez in a way that incorporates your understanding of the cardiology department’s desired treatment goals. This opens the door for you to show you are interested in learning the department’s goals. As a prescriber, it is important for her to know which patients with dilutional hyponatremia are appropriate for treatment with Samsca."</welcomeText>
